title: Domain structure of proteins set member 5

content.question: Which of the following is the most likely result of testing a combination of domains <math alttext="G" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>G</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>M</mtext></math>?

skill.text: 3.B: State the null hypothesis or predict the results of an experiment.
